context: Mid-sized insurance company exploring parametric insurance products for climate risk coverage in agricultural sector, with $50M annual premium volume

request.purpose: Development and launch of parametric crop insurance products
request.justification: Market opportunity in climate risk coverage with 40% growth potential in agricultural insurance segment

decision_process.outcome: Identified 3 target crop types with viable parametric triggers
Developed proof-of-concept models with 85% accuracy in payout predictions
Projected 25% IRR with acceptable risk metrics
Approved for pilot launch in 3 states

business_impact.expected_outcome: New revenue stream generating $8M in first year premiums

lessons_learned: Early regulatory engagement critical for parametric products, customer education essential for market acceptance
